attributes.action: Waive income tax for NHS staff through Coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: NHS staff are working all hours, with poor equipment, many in close proximity to infection to provide the best care possible in terrible circumstances. Then we thank them by paying low salaries and taxing them for the privilege. That’s not fair. They deserve more
attributes.background: The government is financially supporting millions of people through the pandemic, but NHS staff aren’t getting a penny. The least we should do is waive income tax for the duration. Better still, double their pay!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
